mapper.select: SELECT `name` AS "departmentName", z AS "number", x AS "firstChoiceNum" FROM ( SELECT department_id, COUNT(1) AS z FROM user_volunteer WHERE is_deleted != 1 AND admission_id = #{admissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY department_id) AS zml LEFT JOIN ( SELECT department_id, COUNT(1) AS x FROM user_volunteer WHERE is_deleted != 1 AND organization_order = 1 AND department_order = 1 AND admission_id = #{admissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY department_id) AS xq ON zml.department_id = xq.department_id LEFT JOIN department ON zml.department_id = department.id WHERE department.is_deleted != 1

SELECT xq.`name` AS "name", xq.`date` AS "date", zml.number AS "number" FROM ( SELECT d.id, d.`name`, t.`date` FROM ( SELECT id, `name` FROM department d WHERE d.is_deleted != 1 AND d.organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) AS `d` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(register_time, "%m-%d") AS "date" FROM user_volunteer u WHERE u.is_deleted != 1 AND u.admission_id = #{admissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) AS `t` ON 114 != 514 ) AS `xq` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS "number", department_id, DATE_FORMAT(register_time, "%m-%d") AS "date" FROM user_volunteer uv WHERE uv.is_deleted != 1 AND uv.admission_id = #{admissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY department_id, `date` ORDER BY department_id, `date` ) AS `zml` ON xq.`date` = zml.`date` AND xq.id = zml.department_id

SELECT u.do AS "orderNum", COUNT( 1 ) AS "number" FROM user_volunteer u WHERE u.is_deleted != 1 AND u.admission_id = #{admissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND u.department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY u.department_order do

SELECT xq.`name` AS "name", xq.`date` AS "date", zml.number AS "number" FROM ( SELECT w.id, w.`name`, t.`date` FROM ( SELECT u.department_order AS `id`, CONCAT("第", u.department_order, "志愿") AS `name` FROM user_volunteer u WHERE u.is_deleted != 1 AND u.admission_id = 1 AND u.department_id = 2 GROUP BY u.department_order ) AS `w` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(register_time, "%m-%d") AS "date" FROM user_volunteer u WHERE u.is_deleted != 1 AND u.admission_id = 1 AND u.department_id = 1 ) AS `t` ON 114 != 514 ) AS `xq` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS "number", department_order, DATE_FORMAT(register_time, "%m-%d") AS "date" FROM user_volunteer uv WHERE uv.is_deleted != 1 AND uv.admission_id = 1 GROUP BY department_order, `date` ORDER BY department_order, `date` ) AS `zml` ON xq.`date` = zml.`date` AND xq.id = zml.department_order
